### Top Stories selector

Use the top stories selector to choose top stories and features from your state or territory.

Top stories selector

National Top Stories

*   Select top stories from your state or territory

*   Tasmania Top Stories

National top stories
--------------------

*   [### Beijing-based AI network 'Green Cicada' exposed on X, with fears of plan to disrupt US election](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/green-cicada-beijing-ai-network-uncovered-social-media-x/104219752)
    
    [![twitter pic reuters](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/411d3477752580984da9fcbf2353bf1b?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=575&cropW=862&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/green-cicada-beijing-ai-network-uncovered-social-media-x/104219752)
    
    A network of 5,000 accounts apparently being operated using AI has been exposed on X, formerly Twitter, with concerns the Beijing-based operation could be designed to disrupt the coming US election.
    
*   [### A new digital ID is hoped to take the hassle out of renting, banking and visiting the pub](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/trust-exchange-digital-identity-how-does-it-work/104218958)
    
    [![A man scans a QR code with his phone. Behind him, there is a cafe worker at a counter.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5fd3871759d325e13a1548c18f959b76?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=191&cropW=286&xPos=27&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/trust-exchange-digital-identity-how-does-it-work/104218958)
    
    Providing proof of age at the pub, details for checking in at a hotel, and qualifications when applying for a job, the government's proposed "Trust Exchange" system would allow Australians to do it all in a single tap with their phone.
    
*   [### It had rare bipartisan support thanks to a brave MP, but now Labor has put gambling reform on hold](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/peta-murphy-left-online-gambling-legacy-why-isn-t-labor-adopting/104217328)
    
    [![Peta Murphy sits in a committee room inside Parliament House](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/1135dd09576fb98c8dbb5b02d484be71?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1538&cropW=2308&xPos=1233&yPos=159&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/peta-murphy-left-online-gambling-legacy-why-isn-t-labor-adopting/104217328)
    
    ![Brett Worthington](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5961d594d82da84ea3a019e9275384e7?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1737&cropW=1737&xPos=1140&yPos=278&width=160&height=160)
    
    Analysis by Brett Worthington
    
    Peta Murphy's final political act was convincing those who sat opposite her in parliament of the need to tackle online gambling. But it's a message that looks to have fallen short with those who sat much closer on the government's frontbench.
    
*   [### Pilot killed in Cairns helicopter crash identified](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/cairns-fatal-helicopter-crash-at-doubletree-by-hilton-hotel/104214840)
    
    [![Blake Wilson](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/9945bd7242278bf8d40cd1c766c5c638?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=640&cropW=960&xPos=0&yPos=91&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/cairns-fatal-helicopter-crash-at-doubletree-by-hilton-hotel/104214840)
    
    Nautilus Aviation said the employee held a New Zealand pilot's license but had never flown in Australia
    
*   [### As Pelosi attacks Keating's Taiwan comments, she says she would have hit Trump at US Capitol on January 6](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/pelosi-slams-keating-talks-violence-on-trump/104217798)
    
    [![US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi points at a reporter](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/83d63522c7e889c70fb07de19d7815a2?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1200&cropW=1804&xPos=396&yPos=245&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/pelosi-slams-keating-talks-violence-on-trump/104217798)
    
    Former prime minister Paul Keating's comments on Taiwan draw international attention as former US speaker of the house Nancy Pelosi goes on the attack over his "Chinese real estate" remark.
    
*   [### Scott Morrison says Linda Reynolds's 'lying cow' comment was 'out of character'](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/scott-morrison-linda-reynolds-brittany-higgins-trial/104216308)
    
    [![Linda Reynolds speaks at a doorstop as the PM Scott Morrison stands behind her grinning](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/b62e137b7bb734b5f2168bbc2263d668?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1988&cropW=2991&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/scott-morrison-linda-reynolds-brittany-higgins-trial/104216308)
    
    The defamation trial between WA senator Linda Reynolds and her ex-staffer Brittany Higgins hears from former Prime Minister Scott Morrison.
    
*   [### Police launch homicide investigation after 10-year-old found dead on Gold Coast](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/police-homicide-investigation-carrara-10-year-old-dead/104221368)
    
    [![Police tape is strapped to a tree and lines an area guarded by a police officer, with the police car's lights on.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/c4aab927950cb00ee2dd47962bbdd873?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1613&cropW=2420&xPos=0&yPos=101&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/police-homicide-investigation-carrara-10-year-old-dead/104221368)
    
    Police have launched a homicide investigation following the death of a girl in Carrara, on the Gold Coast.Â 
    
*   [### 'A little too strong for inflation': What recent wage price data tells us about future interest rate decisions](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/wage-price-index-june-quarter-2024-australia/104217102)
    
    [![Generic picture of Australian bank notes](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/01a457437a61cb3f467afe0e365c55ec?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=576&cropW=864&xPos=80&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/wage-price-index-june-quarter-2024-australia/104217102)
    
    The annual pace of wage growth has remained steady in the June quarter, at 4.1 per cent, with an increase in public sector wage growth offsetting a decline in private sector wages.
    
*   [### 'Embarrassing for Putin': Russian territory is under occupation for the first time since WWII](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/ukraine-russia-war-kursk-incursion-surprise-attack-occupation/104213300)
    
    [![Ukrainian servicemen sit on tops of a military vehicle, realxing with one eating a packet of chips.  ](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5e6a8de5e6a7f6ed83bed1e50debec88?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3333&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=71&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/ukraine-russia-war-kursk-incursion-surprise-attack-occupation/104213300)
    
    Since launching a surprise attack last week, Moscow has been unable to push Ukrainian troops back after they advanced up to 30km into Russian territory and are now in control of about 28 settlements.
    
*   [### Former police officer accused of murdering Sydney couple has charges replaced](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/beau-lamarre-condon-committal-dv-murder-charges-police/104217508)
    
    [![Beau Lamarre in a police uniform](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/165907e3360b6d319959f3449d131826?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1121&cropW=1682&xPos=0&yPos=126&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/beau-lamarre-condon-committal-dv-murder-charges-police/104217508)
    
    It was the first time Beau Lamarre-Condon's case has been in court since police last month laid two fresh charges which now allege the murders were domestic violence-related.
    
*   [### Extremism expert tells Wieambilla inquest the 'battle arrived' the moment the officers crossed 'the Rubicon'](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/wieambilla-inquest-radicalised-shooters-final-battle/104219102)
    
    [![Nathaniel, Gareth and Stacey Train graphic black and white with aerial view of their property behind](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/fa6c80c67bb5c13d87f2af38f15cca14?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=933&cropW=1400&xPos=0&yPos=1&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/wieambilla-inquest-radicalised-shooters-final-battle/104219102)
    
    Three "radicalised" conspiracy theorists who gunned down two police officers and their neighbour believed they were in a "final battle" as "the end" arrived, a Queensland court has heard.
    
*   [### SES warns northern NSW to brace for more flooding, with record-breaking rains expected to continue](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/regions-brace-for-flood-ahead-of-rain-event-records-broken/104220916)
    
    [![An aerial photo of flooded fields](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/bb53052464502066f6eb4ac64353fc9e?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2250&cropW=4000&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=485)](/news/2024-08-13/regions-brace-for-flood-ahead-of-rain-event-records-broken/104220916)
    
    A coastal trough is expected to extend from Queensland to the NSW north coast on Tuesday evening and the SES is warning people to be prepared.
    
*   [### Elon Musk claims 'massive DDOS attack' on X during Donald Trump interview](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/elon-musk-claims-massive-ddos-attack-on-x-donald-trump-interview/104217582)
    
    [![Elon Musk](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/4ecc840a696d950c45c1a12f636b1e93?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3161&cropW=4742&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/elon-musk-claims-massive-ddos-attack-on-x-donald-trump-interview/104217582)
    
    The site showed that the page was "not available" shortly after the scheduled start for some users.
    
*   [### Mother, son guilty of murdering teenager in 'revenge' hit-and-run](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/taj-hart-nowra-hit-and-run-murder-trial-guilty-verdict/104201844)
    
    [![Boy playing football](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/547b4ec50e92d99f66e913dd75232676?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=552&cropW=828&xPos=0&yPos=367&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/taj-hart-nowra-hit-and-run-murder-trial-guilty-verdict/104201844)
    
    Jayden Walmsley-Hume, 20, and his mother Katie Walmsley, 40, have been found guilty of seeking out and running down Taj Hart in their ute on a suburban south coast New South Wales street in February 2022. Â 
    
*   [### Europe's firefighters called to help battle Greek blaze as one person reported dead](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/wildfire-in-greece-enters-athens-and-kills-woman/104220962)
    
    [![Two men hold a firehose in front of a fire on shrubland.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/44fc720d35472fe9c90d31fc5c0859aa?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3333&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/wildfire-in-greece-enters-athens-and-kills-woman/104220962)
    
    Hundreds of Greek firefighters are battling a wildfire that has now entered Athens and killed at least one person.
    
*   [### NRL judiciary hands Kyle Flanagan four-game ban after finding him guilty of biting Stephen Crichton](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/nrl-judiciary-finds-flanagan-guilty-of-biting-crichton/104220968)
    
    [![St George Illawarra Dragons player Kyle Flanagan is alleged to have bit Canterbury Bulldogs player Stephen Crichton on the nose](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/eb349930160e992da02677ee1c30ca59?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=720&cropW=1080&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/nrl-judiciary-finds-flanagan-guilty-of-biting-crichton/104220968)
    
    Kyle Â Flanagan had said on several occasions during the hearing he "definitely did not bite Stephen Crichton", and also claimed he did not know a nose was in his mouth.
    
*   [### 'This is outrageous': Basil Zempilas accuses government of bullying and stealing land over school deal](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/east-perth-primary-school-stoush-tony-buti-basil-zempilas/104219578)
    
    [![Basil Zempilas composite](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/9c7fd3432fe0c2d387cbfcacef88885f?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=533&cropW=800&xPos=0&yPos=33&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/east-perth-primary-school-stoush-tony-buti-basil-zempilas/104219578)
    
    WA's government will force the City of Perth and its Liberal-candidate Lord Mayor Basil Zempilas to hand over prime land so it can build a new primary school, in an escalation of an ongoing political stoush.
    
*   [### 'This country is not for us': Bangladesh's Hindus in fear as attacks and misinformation inflame tensions](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/bangladesh-hindu-protests-against-attacks-misinformation-spreads/104204946)
    
    [![A mural of a Bangladeshi woman with her head partially covered ](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5868a0da3c9363f1c518338b16b7d764?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2270&cropW=3405&xPos=0&yPos=2&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/bangladesh-hindu-protests-against-attacks-misinformation-spreads/104204946)
    
    Hindus and Muslims came together in Bangladesh in nationwide protests for political reform. Now, old fissures are being reopened.
    
*   [### 'Enough is enough': Construction insider relates CFMEU 'bully' tactics](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/construction-insider-speaks-out-against-cfmeu/104217014)
    
    [![A flag that says CFMEU flying at a construction site.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/de0faf406162485650609f4f297dd044?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3333&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=1&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/construction-insider-speaks-out-against-cfmeu/104217014)
    
    A construction industry insider who alleges he was physically struck by a CFMEU member has accused union officials of acting like "the meanest bully you've ever come across."
    
*   [### CAS reportedly will not consider allowing US gymnast to keep bronze medal won by Romanian](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/paris-olympics-gymnastics-jordan-chiles-bronze-medal-ana-barbosu/104218492)
    
    [![Jordan Chiles posing with a gold and bronze Olympic medal from the Paris Games](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/3b299c77f66676a75c65ea6fa5d3d169?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2813&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=260&width=862&height=485)](/news/2024-08-13/paris-olympics-gymnastics-jordan-chiles-bronze-medal-ana-barbosu/104218492)
    
    USA Gymnastics officials have said an arbitration panel will not reconsider a decision asking gymnast Jordan Chiles to return the bronze medal she was awarded in the floor exercise at the Paris Olympics.
    
*   [### Theatre is 'fun, sexy and cool': The new artistic director of STC has a plan to challenge Netflix](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/sydney-theatre-company-artistic-director-mitchell-butel/104207298)
    
    [![Mitchell Butel, a 54-year-old man, wearing a bright, multicoloured jumper, smiles as he leans forward in a chair, hands clasped.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/f7f24e7a2820030b31886071d16362db?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2042&cropW=3064&xPos=255&yPos=280&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/sydney-theatre-company-artistic-director-mitchell-butel/104207298)
    
    Award-winning actor, writer and director Mitchell Butel will leave State Theatre Company South Australia to join Sydney Theatre Company at the end of the year. Â 
    
*   [### Recipes and tips for making food for an elderly friend or loved one](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/recipes-tips-for-making-food-for-elderly-family-friend/104213294)
    
    [![A smiling older woman wearing a white long-sleeve shirt eats a meal at table with younger family members.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/b9eb9cb26defd680e2e2721050c2232d?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3333&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/recipes-tips-for-making-food-for-elderly-family-friend/104213294)
    
    Whether Grandma has moved in or you're looking out for an elderly neighbour, you might be wondering what's best to cook for older adults.
    
*   [### Swedish probe into disqualified Eurovision contestant dropped](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/joost-klein-investigation-dropped-swedish-eurovision/104217698)
    
    [![Joost Klein members, one in a blue bird costume, one in a blue suit and the other in an EU flag shirt](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/0b06c802c70075371814045b86fad9fc?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3333&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/joost-klein-investigation-dropped-swedish-eurovision/104217698)
    
    The closure of the investigation against Joost Klein has been welcomed by Dutch broadcaster AVROTROS, but the European Broadcasting Union stands by its decision to disqualify him.
    
*   [### The Australian woman in 'constant pain' after travelling to India for cheaper dental work](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/indian-dental-clinic-low-cost-dentistry-fake-reviews-removed/104205618)
    
    [![A woman, holds her mouth open, and shows off her teeth after dental work.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/6b2d2b1f75868de16950036d2758ff8f?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1667&cropW=2500&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/indian-dental-clinic-low-cost-dentistry-fake-reviews-removed/104205618)
    
    An Indian dental clinic which markets cut-price services to Australians has been accused of using fake online reviews and price gouging â leaving one woman in pain after she travelled to the subcontinent for care.
    
*   [### Matildas players to be consulted over new head coach](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/matildas-players-consulted-by-football-australia-head-coach-/104219252)
    
    [![Ellie Carpenter, Katrina Gorry and Mackenzie Arnold all looking confused on the football pitch, questioning a ref decision](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/f682e01be111d8689ce985901e0d8157?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1273&cropW=1909&xPos=113&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/matildas-players-consulted-by-football-australia-head-coach-/104219252)
    
    Matildas players, including injured captain Sam Kerr, will be consulted by Football Australia in the crucial search for the team's next coach.
    
*   [### To beat Trump, Harris will likely need this small state. Here's how she and Walz are faring in Wisconsin](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/how-harris-and-walz-fare-against-trump-in-americas-heartland/104213402)
    
    [![A man and woman stand on a stage ](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/2311cf9ac434dc29b4ad013515748110?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1875&cropW=3333&xPos=395&yPos=396&width=862&height=485)](/news/2024-08-13/how-harris-and-walz-fare-against-trump-in-americas-heartland/104213402)
    
    Once a Democratic stronghold, Wisconsin flipped for Trump in 2016. Now, both Republicans and Democrats are scrambling for votes in America's "dairyland".
    
*   [### The nude female body has been depicted in art countless times. But where is all the pubic hair?](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/why-don-t-paintings-of-women-have-pubes/104169474)
    
    [![A marle statue of three headless female figures, standing nude, side by side, with arms on one another. ](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/37e2d296af27c8d0b4fd6d0116cbc57a?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2667&cropW=4000&xPos=0&yPos=322&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/why-don-t-paintings-of-women-have-pubes/104169474)
    
    From the influence of the devil to overzealous restorers, there are numerous strange reasons and theories behind the conspicuous lack of pubic hair on women depicted in Western art.
    
*   [### Displaced Lebanese beg to go home as country braces for worse fighting](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/displaced-lebanese-beg-to-go-home-as-country-braces-for-war/104211898)
    
    [![A woman wearing a hijab and long dress stands next to a window in a corridor with her hand on the window sill](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/688f84fc2548691b69539084f69b6859?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3027&cropW=4540&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/displaced-lebanese-beg-to-go-home-as-country-braces-for-war/104211898)
    
    People from southern Lebanon have had to flee the daily air strikes on their villages, and for months have stayed in derelict hotels-turned-shelters.

National top stories
--------------------

*   [### Beijing-based AI network 'Green Cicada' exposed on X, with fears of plan to disrupt US election](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/green-cicada-beijing-ai-network-uncovered-social-media-x/104219752)
    
    [![twitter pic reuters](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/411d3477752580984da9fcbf2353bf1b?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=575&cropW=862&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/green-cicada-beijing-ai-network-uncovered-social-media-x/104219752)
    
    A network of 5,000 accounts apparently being operated using AI has been exposed on X, formerly Twitter, with concerns the Beijing-based operation could be designed to disrupt the coming US election.
    
*   [### A new digital ID is hoped to take the hassle out of renting, banking and visiting the pub](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/trust-exchange-digital-identity-how-does-it-work/104218958)
    
    [![A man scans a QR code with his phone. Behind him, there is a cafe worker at a counter.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5fd3871759d325e13a1548c18f959b76?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=191&cropW=286&xPos=27&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/trust-exchange-digital-identity-how-does-it-work/104218958)
    
    Providing proof of age at the pub, details for checking in at a hotel, and qualifications when applying for a job, the government's proposed "Trust Exchange" system would allow Australians to do it all in a single tap with their phone.
    
*   [### It had rare bipartisan support thanks to a brave MP, but now Labor has put gambling reform on hold](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/peta-murphy-left-online-gambling-legacy-why-isn-t-labor-adopting/104217328)
    
    [![Peta Murphy sits in a committee room inside Parliament House](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/1135dd09576fb98c8dbb5b02d484be71?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1538&cropW=2308&xPos=1233&yPos=159&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/peta-murphy-left-online-gambling-legacy-why-isn-t-labor-adopting/104217328)
    
    ![Brett Worthington](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5961d594d82da84ea3a019e9275384e7?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1737&cropW=1737&xPos=1140&yPos=278&width=160&height=160)
    
    Analysis by Brett Worthington
    
    Peta Murphy's final political act was convincing those who sat opposite her in parliament of the need to tackle online gambling. But it's a message that looks to have fallen short with those who sat much closer on the government's frontbench.
    
*   [### Pilot killed in Cairns helicopter crash identified](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/cairns-fatal-helicopter-crash-at-doubletree-by-hilton-hotel/104214840)
    
    [![Blake Wilson](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/9945bd7242278bf8d40cd1c766c5c638?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=640&cropW=960&xPos=0&yPos=91&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/cairns-fatal-helicopter-crash-at-doubletree-by-hilton-hotel/104214840)
    
    Nautilus Aviation said the employee held a New Zealand pilot's license but had never flown in Australia
    
*   [### As Pelosi attacks Keating's Taiwan comments, she says she would have hit Trump at US Capitol on January 6](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/pelosi-slams-keating-talks-violence-on-trump/104217798)
    
    [![US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi points at a reporter](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/83d63522c7e889c70fb07de19d7815a2?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1200&cropW=1804&xPos=396&yPos=245&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/pelosi-slams-keating-talks-violence-on-trump/104217798)
    
    Former prime minister Paul Keating's comments on Taiwan draw international attention as former US speaker of the house Nancy Pelosi goes on the attack over his "Chinese real estate" remark.
    
*   [### Scott Morrison says Linda Reynolds's 'lying cow' comment was 'out of character'](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/scott-morrison-linda-reynolds-brittany-higgins-trial/104216308)
    
    [![Linda Reynolds speaks at a doorstop as the PM Scott Morrison stands behind her grinning](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/b62e137b7bb734b5f2168bbc2263d668?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1988&cropW=2991&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/scott-morrison-linda-reynolds-brittany-higgins-trial/104216308)
    
    The defamation trial between WA senator Linda Reynolds and her ex-staffer Brittany Higgins hears from former Prime Minister Scott Morrison.
    
*   [### Police launch homicide investigation after 10-year-old found dead on Gold Coast](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/police-homicide-investigation-carrara-10-year-old-dead/104221368)
    
    [![Police tape is strapped to a tree and lines an area guarded by a police officer, with the police car's lights on.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/c4aab927950cb00ee2dd47962bbdd873?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1613&cropW=2420&xPos=0&yPos=101&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/police-homicide-investigation-carrara-10-year-old-dead/104221368)

Analysis

### [analysis:It had rare bipartisan support thanks to a brave MP, but now Labor has put gambling reform on hold](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/peta-murphy-left-online-gambling-legacy-why-isn-t-labor-adopting/104217328)

By political correspondent [Brett Worthington](https://www.abc.net.au/news/brett-worthington/4725564)

Peta Murphy's final political act was convincing those who sat opposite her in parliament of the need to tackle online gambling. But it's a message that looks to have fallen short with those who sat much closer on the government's frontbench.

![Peta Murphy sits in a committee room inside Parliament House](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/1135dd09576fb98c8dbb5b02d484be71?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2746&cropW=4882&xPos=0&yPos=82&width=862&height=485)

Analysis

### [analysis:Raising the criminal age to 14 was a signature Daniel Andrews move â why has his successor dumped it?](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/victoria-youth-crime-age-of-criminal-responsibility-in-spotlight/104215232)

By [Ben Knight](https://www.abc.net.au/news/ben-knight/166868)

Victoria's upper house will this week debate a government bill raising the age of criminal responsibility from 10 to 12, but it comes just as community concerns about youth crime are peaking.

![Jacinta Allan appears thoughtful, standing at a formal government press conference.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/9d67da4912e7909f94c9cd3e0baa7b78?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2813&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=282&width=862&height=485)

### [analysis:The great wealth shuffle. Why millennials are missing out](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/widening-generational-divide-real-estate-interest-rates/104215946)

By chief business correspondentÂ [Ian Verrender](https://www.abc.net.au/news/ian-verrender/5261264)

Whatever way you try to split it, the generational divide between millennials and baby boomers is growing â and it's our Australian obsession with owning property that is widening the gap, and interest rates that are keeping it that way.

![Crowd of people on the streets of Sydney](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/4362868b55b7b1e9e8b06a332c69ad82?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2089&cropW=3713&xPos=0&yPos=166&width=862&height=485)

National top stories
--------------------

*   [### Beijing-based AI network 'Green Cicada' exposed on X, with fears of plan to disrupt US election](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/green-cicada-beijing-ai-network-uncovered-social-media-x/104219752)
    
    [![twitter pic reuters](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/411d3477752580984da9fcbf2353bf1b?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=575&cropW=862&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/green-cicada-beijing-ai-network-uncovered-social-media-x/104219752)
    
    A network of 5,000 accounts apparently being operated using AI has been exposed on X, formerly Twitter, with concerns the Beijing-based operation could be designed to disrupt the coming US election.
    
*   [### A new digital ID is hoped to take the hassle out of renting, banking and visiting the pub](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/trust-exchange-digital-identity-how-does-it-work/104218958)
    
    [![A man scans a QR code with his phone. Behind him, there is a cafe worker at a counter.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5fd3871759d325e13a1548c18f959b76?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=191&cropW=286&xPos=27&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/trust-exchange-digital-identity-how-does-it-work/104218958)
    
    Providing proof of age at the pub, details for checking in at a hotel, and qualifications when applying for a job, the government's proposed "Trust Exchange" system would allow Australians to do it all in a single tap with their phone.
    
*   [### It had rare bipartisan support thanks to a brave MP, but now Labor has put gambling reform on hold](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/peta-murphy-left-online-gambling-legacy-why-isn-t-labor-adopting/104217328)
    
    [![Peta Murphy sits in a committee room inside Parliament House](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/1135dd09576fb98c8dbb5b02d484be71?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1538&cropW=2308&xPos=1233&yPos=159&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/peta-murphy-left-online-gambling-legacy-why-isn-t-labor-adopting/104217328)
    
    ![Brett Worthington](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5961d594d82da84ea3a019e9275384e7?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1737&cropW=1737&xPos=1140&yPos=278&width=160&height=160)
    
    Analysis by Brett Worthington
    
    Peta Murphy's final political act was convincing those who sat opposite her in parliament of the need to tackle online gambling. But it's a message that looks to have fallen short with those who sat much closer on the government's frontbench.
    
*   [### Pilot killed in Cairns helicopter crash identified](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/cairns-fatal-helicopter-crash-at-doubletree-by-hilton-hotel/104214840)
    
    [![Blake Wilson](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/9945bd7242278bf8d40cd1c766c5c638?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=640&cropW=960&xPos=0&yPos=91&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/cairns-fatal-helicopter-crash-at-doubletree-by-hilton-hotel/104214840)
    
    Nautilus Aviation said the employee held a New Zealand pilot's license but had never flown in Australia
    
*   [### As Pelosi attacks Keating's Taiwan comments, she says she would have hit Trump at US Capitol on January 6](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/pelosi-slams-keating-talks-violence-on-trump/104217798)
    
    [![US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi points at a reporter](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/83d63522c7e889c70fb07de19d7815a2?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1200&cropW=1804&xPos=396&yPos=245&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/pelosi-slams-keating-talks-violence-on-trump/104217798)
    
    Former prime minister Paul Keating's comments on Taiwan draw international attention as former US speaker of the house Nancy Pelosi goes on the attack over his "Chinese real estate" remark.
    
*   [### Scott Morrison says Linda Reynolds's 'lying cow' comment was 'out of character'](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/scott-morrison-linda-reynolds-brittany-higgins-trial/104216308)
    
    [![Linda Reynolds speaks at a doorstop as the PM Scott Morrison stands behind her grinning](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/b62e137b7bb734b5f2168bbc2263d668?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1988&cropW=2991&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/scott-morrison-linda-reynolds-brittany-higgins-trial/104216308)
    
    The defamation trial between WA senator Linda Reynolds and her ex-staffer Brittany Higgins hears from former Prime Minister Scott Morrison.
    
*   [### Police launch homicide investigation after 10-year-old found dead on Gold Coast](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/police-homicide-investigation-carrara-10-year-old-dead/104221368)
    
    [![Police tape is strapped to a tree and lines an area guarded by a police officer, with the police car's lights on.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/c4aab927950cb00ee2dd47962bbdd873?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1613&cropW=2420&xPos=0&yPos=101&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/police-homicide-investigation-carrara-10-year-old-dead/104221368)
    
    Police have launched a homicide investigation following the death of a girl in Carrara, on the Gold Coast.Â 
    
*   [### 'A little too strong for inflation': What recent wage price data tells us about future interest rate decisions](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/wage-price-index-june-quarter-2024-australia/104217102)
    
    [![Generic picture of Australian bank notes](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/01a457437a61cb3f467afe0e365c55ec?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=576&cropW=864&xPos=80&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/wage-price-index-june-quarter-2024-australia/104217102)
    
    The annual pace of wage growth has remained steady in the June quarter, at 4.1 per cent, with an increase in public sector wage growth offsetting a decline in private sector wages.
    
*   [### 'Embarrassing for Putin': Russian territory is under occupation for the first time since WWII](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/ukraine-russia-war-kursk-incursion-surprise-attack-occupation/104213300)
    
    [![Ukrainian servicemen sit on tops of a military vehicle, realxing with one eating a packet of chips.  ](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5e6a8de5e6a7f6ed83bed1e50debec88?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3333&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=71&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/ukraine-russia-war-kursk-incursion-surprise-attack-occupation/104213300)
    
    Since launching a surprise attack last week, Moscow has been unable to push Ukrainian troops back after they advanced up to 30km into Russian territory and are now in control of about 28 settlements.
    
*   [### Former police officer accused of murdering Sydney couple has charges replaced](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/beau-lamarre-condon-committal-dv-murder-charges-police/104217508)
    
    [![Beau Lamarre in a police uniform](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/165907e3360b6d319959f3449d131826?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=1121&cropW=1682&xPos=0&yPos=126&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/beau-lamarre-condon-committal-dv-murder-charges-police/104217508)
    
    It was the first time Beau Lamarre-Condon's case has been in court since police last month laid two fresh charges which now allege the murders were domestic violence-related.
    
*   [### Extremism expert tells Wieambilla inquest the 'battle arrived' the moment the officers crossed 'the Rubicon'](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/wieambilla-inquest-radicalised-shooters-final-battle/104219102)
    
    [![Nathaniel, Gareth and Stacey Train graphic black and white with aerial view of their property behind](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/fa6c80c67bb5c13d87f2af38f15cca14?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=933&cropW=1400&xPos=0&yPos=1&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/wieambilla-inquest-radicalised-shooters-final-battle/104219102)
    
    Three "radicalised" conspiracy theorists who gunned down two police officers and their neighbour believed they were in a "final battle" as "the end" arrived, a Queensland court has heard.
    
*   [### SES warns northern NSW to brace for more flooding, with record-breaking rains expected to continue](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/regions-brace-for-flood-ahead-of-rain-event-records-broken/104220916)
    
    [![An aerial photo of flooded fields](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/bb53052464502066f6eb4ac64353fc9e?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2250&cropW=4000&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=485)](/news/2024-08-13/regions-brace-for-flood-ahead-of-rain-event-records-broken/104220916)
    
    A coastal trough is expected to extend from Queensland to the NSW north coast on Tuesday evening and the SES is warning people to be prepared.
    
*   [### Elon Musk claims 'massive DDOS attack' on X during Donald Trump interview](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/elon-musk-claims-massive-ddos-attack-on-x-donald-trump-interview/104217582)
    
    [![Elon Musk](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/4ecc840a696d950c45c1a12f636b1e93?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3161&cropW=4742&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/elon-musk-claims-massive-ddos-attack-on-x-donald-trump-interview/104217582)
    
    The site showed that the page was "not available" shortly after the scheduled start for some users.
    
*   [### Mother, son guilty of murdering teenager in 'revenge' hit-and-run](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/taj-hart-nowra-hit-and-run-murder-trial-guilty-verdict/104201844)
    
    [![Boy playing football](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/547b4ec50e92d99f66e913dd75232676?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=552&cropW=828&xPos=0&yPos=367&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/taj-hart-nowra-hit-and-run-murder-trial-guilty-verdict/104201844)
    
    Jayden Walmsley-Hume, 20, and his mother Katie Walmsley, 40, have been found guilty of seeking out and running down Taj Hart in their ute on a suburban south coast New South Wales street in February 2022. Â 
    
*   [### Europe's firefighters called to help battle Greek blaze as one person reported dead](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/wildfire-in-greece-enters-athens-and-kills-woman/104220962)
    
    [![Two men hold a firehose in front of a fire on shrubland.](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/44fc720d35472fe9c90d31fc5c0859aa?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=3333&cropW=5000&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/wildfire-in-greece-enters-athens-and-kills-woman/104220962)
    
    Hundreds of Greek firefighters are battling a wildfire that has now entered Athens and killed at least one person.
    
*   [### NRL judiciary hands Kyle Flanagan four-game ban after finding him guilty of biting Stephen Crichton](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/nrl-judiciary-finds-flanagan-guilty-of-biting-crichton/104220968)
    
    [![St George Illawarra Dragons player Kyle Flanagan is alleged to have bit Canterbury Bulldogs player Stephen Crichton on the nose](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/eb349930160e992da02677ee1c30ca59?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=720&cropW=1080&xPos=0&yPos=0&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/nrl-judiciary-finds-flanagan-guilty-of-biting-crichton/104220968)
    
    Kyle Â Flanagan had said on several occasions during the hearing he "definitely did not bite Stephen Crichton", and also claimed he did not know a nose was in his mouth.
    
*   [### 'This is outrageous': Basil Zempilas accuses government of bullying and stealing land over school deal](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/east-perth-primary-school-stoush-tony-buti-basil-zempilas/104219578)
    
    [![Basil Zempilas composite](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/9c7fd3432fe0c2d387cbfcacef88885f?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=533&cropW=800&xPos=0&yPos=33&width=160&height=107)](/news/2024-08-13/east-perth-primary-school-stoush-tony-buti-basil-zempilas/104219578)
    
    WA's government will force the City of Perth and its Liberal-candidate Lord Mayor Basil Zempilas to hand over prime land so it can build a new primary school, in an escalation of an ongoing political stoush.
    
*   [### 'This country is not for us': Bangladesh's Hindus in fear as attacks and misinformation inflame tensions](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/bangladesh-hindu-protests-against-attacks-misinformation-spreads/104204946)
    
    [![A mural of a Bangladeshi woman with her head partially covered ](https://live-production.wcms.abc-cdn.net.au/5868a0da3c9363f1c518338b16b7d764?impolicy=wcms_crop_resize&cropH=2270&cropW=3405&xPos=0&yPos=2&width=862&height=575)](/news/2024-08-13/bangladesh-hindu-protests-against-attacks-misinformation-spreads/104204946)
    
    Hindus and Muslims came together in Bangladesh in nationwide protests for political reform. Now, old fissures are being reopened.
    
*   [### 'Enough is enough': Construction insider relates CFMEU 'bully' tactics](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2024-08-13/construction-insider-speaks-out-against-cfmeu/104217014)

 and [Cody Atkinson](https://www.abc.net.au/news/cody-atkinson/12422846)

Australia is always one of the most well-represented countries at the Olympics, boasting a team of 460 athletes this year in Paris. Here is a state-by-state breakdown of the record-breaking team that has taken the Games by storm.
